title: The 12 most luxurious hotel suites in Europe
text: BING NEWS: The 12 most luxurious hotel suites in Europe Prague Suite at Blakes Hotel, London: A sexy lair hidden beneath the first floor of Blakes, the Prague Suite is decked out in lush grays and golds. The ornate vibe, created by a mix of mirrors and chandeliers, continues to the bathroom, complete with a ... 09/30/2015 - 1:20 am | View Link Woolley's Classic Suites And Simmons Earn Rave Reviews For Delivering A Luxurious Sleep Experience "Our top two priorities are the safety/security and comfort of our hotel guests and the sleep experience we deliver," said Jess Briley, general manager, Woolley's Classic Suites. "If they don't get a good night's sleep, we haven't done our job.
